Home_Text: I'm a web developer who loves making the web a more awesome place. I write code that works, most of the time, and designs that always impress. Explore my portfolio and let's create something incredible together!
About_Me_Text_1: I'm a Self-taught Web Developer based in Lübeck, Germany. And current Bachelor's student in Computer Science at Technische Hochschule Lübeck. My journey into web development began with curiosity and has grown into a full-fledged passion.
About_Me_Text_2: I've mastered HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I'm eagerly exploring advanced frameworks like React and NEXT. I thrive on transforming concepts into sleek, user-friendly websites and am always hungry for new challenges and learning opportunities.
About_Me_Text_3: Outside of coding, I unwind by playing chess, and experimenting with culinary creations. I'm also an avid sci-fi fan who enjoys immersing myself in captivating stories.
About_Me_Text_4: Let's connect and build something amazing together! Reach out to me at
first_project_description: Developed a dynamic e-commerce platform for footwear, featuring seamless user authentication, secure payment processing, and a responsive design for an optimal shopping experience.
second_project_description: Developed an Engaging Portfolio Website Showcasing My Development Expertise and Creative Design Skills
third_project_description: Created a visually appealing and user-friendly landing page for an online school, highlighting key features, course offerings, and student testimonials to attract prospective learners
no_ads: No ads, no tracking. Enjoy your day!
